review: Love my Fire Stick...Very easy set up...Awesome device....Very pleased with my purchase.
author: Judith Smith

review: User friendly and the price is right
author: kurt

review: I like it but i guess i thought that there might be some free stuff to watch or at least less expensive. 3$ an episode for my kids cartoons is a little much for me.
author: ADT

review: Love the Fire Stick!  Such a smart way to cut the cable and still get quality TV!
author: S. Essmann-Frie

review: I Loved it until it quit working! Using this fire stick I am seriously considering no longer paying for satellite television. Then it quit working. However Amazon is immediately replacing it!
author: Michelle Colbert

review: exceeded all expectations. What a great buy!
author: L. Hebert "sleeper"

review: I love the amazon fire stick. It allows me to access all of my amazon content. I have access to pictures, movies, as well as all of the additional apps that are included. Not real technical,  no problem. It is really easy to set up and use. Have all of your favorites at the tip of your fingers with included remote. Netflix and many more popular apps are included. This is something my whole family is enjoying. Now letting everyone I know about this product.
author: Kindle Customer
